message.name: ERR_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: A Location Structure must not be already canceled.
A Location Structure must not be already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_XRV_CANCEL_ACTIVE
message.locale: An active Location Structure can not be canceled.
An active Location Structure can not be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: A Location Structure with this name already exists.
A Location Structure with this name already exists.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVATE_CANCELED_LOCATION_STRUCTURE
message.locale: You can not activate a canceled Location Structure
You can not activate a cancelled Location Structure

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_AS_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: You cannot modify this Location Structure as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this Location Structure as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTIVE_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_ALREADY_ACTIVE
message.locale: You can not activate a Location Structure that is already active.
You can not activate a Location Structure that is already active.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_STRUCTURE_XRV_ROOT_LOCATION_MUST_EXIST
message.locale: The location structure cannot be displayed as there is no location indicated as a root location.
